message.body: Do you have a min to discuss mark?
Gave him the offer. He really appreciates us working with him. He asked for time so he can discuss with his wife. Asked if tomorrow morning would work. So he is calling first thing tomorrow.
I think the 90 day with salary bump may have seemed too much of an entry level plan for him, glad we nixed the idea. Whats your guess on his answer tomorrow?
I am really not sure. I talk myself into thinking he is leaning now the yes.
